history.narrative: Law 3-150 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-349, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 30, 1980 and October 14, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 29, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-275 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
